Philip David Ochs (/ˈoʊks/; December 19, 1940 -Eprel 9, 1976) bụ onye America na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwu mkpesa (ma ọ bụ, dịka ọ họọrọ, onye na-abụ abụ)
A maara Ochs maka ọgụgụ isi ya, ọchị, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ịbụ abụ abụ, na olu pụrụ iche
O dere ọtụtụ narị egwu n'afọ ndi 1960s na 1970s wee wepụta abọm asatọ.

A mụrụ Phil Ochs na Disemba 19, 1940, na El Paso, Texas, nwa Jacob "Jack" Ochs, onye dọkịta a mụrụ na New York na August 11, 1910, na Gertrude Phin Ochs, a mụrụ na February 26, 1912, na Scotland. Nne na nna ya zutere ma lụọ di na nwunye na Edinburgh ebe Jack nọ na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụike. Mgbe ha lụsịrị di, ha kwagara na United States
Jack, onye e debara aha ya n'ọrụ agha, e zigara ya mba ofesi na njedebe nke Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, ebe ọ gwọrọ ndị agha na Agha nke Bulge

Ahụmahụ agha ya metụtara ahụike uche ya ma nata nkwụsị ahụike dị ùgwù na Nọvemba afọ 1945. N'ịbụ onye na-arịa ọrịa uche na ịda mbà n'obi mgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụlọ, Jack enweghị ike ịmepụta ọrụ ahụike na-aga nke ọma ma rụọ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọgwụ gburugburu mba ahụ. N'ihi ya, ezinụlọ Ochs na-akwaga ugboro ugboro: na Far Rockaway, New York, mgbe Ochs bụ onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma; mgbe ahụ na Perrysburg na ọdịda anyanwụ New York, ebe ọ malitere ịmụ egwu; wee gaa Columbus, Ohio.  Ochs tolitere na nwanne nwanyị tọrọ ya, Sonia (nke a maara dịka Sonny, a mụrụ na 1937), na nwanne nwoke nke obere, Michael (a mụrụ n'afọ 1943). Ezinụlọ Ochs bụ ndị nọ n'etiti na ndị Juu, mana ha abụghị ndị okpukpe. Nna ya nọ n'ebe dị anya site na nwunye ya na ụmụ ya, a kpọgakwara ya n'ụlọ ọgwụ maka ịda mbà n'obi; ọ nwụrụ na Eprel 30, 1963, site na ọbara ọgbụgba ụbụrụ. Nne ya nwụrụ na Machị 9, 1994.
